div.pre: 1405 Gordium, 1961 Burial: c. 205 B.C. Contents: 100 AR. Pot hoard from excava- tions Alexander III: 12 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 6, Pella 1, Aradus 2, Babylon 2, Alexandreia 1) 24 late post. tetradr. (Odes- sus 1, Sinope 2, Tenedos 1, Magnesia 1, Priene 1, Chios 1, Termessus 1,Aradus 4, Simyra 1, "Gerrha" 1, unc. mints 6, barb. imit. 4) Philip III: 1 tetradr. (unc. mint) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 2 tetradr. (Amphi- polis) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 4 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 1, Pella 1, Lampsacus 1, Sardes 1) 11 post. tetradr. (Lysima- cheia 1, Byzantium 3, Calchedon 1, unc. mints 6) Nicomedes I: 1 tetradr. Prusias I: 1 tetradr. Eumenes I: 1 tetradr. Perge: 2 tetradr. Seleucus I: 7 tetradr. (Laodiceia ad mare 1, Seleuceia ad Tigrim 2, Susa 1, Ecba- tana 2, unc. mint 1) Antiochus I: 4 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 3, Susa 1) Antiochus II: 2 tetradr. (Tarsus 1, Ecba- tana 1) Seleucus II: 12 tetradr. (Sardes 1, Tarsus 1, Antiocheia 3, Apameia 1, Nisibis 2, Seleuceia ad Tigrim 3, unc. mint 1) Antiochus Hierax: 5 tetradr. (Sardes 4, unc. mint 1) Seleucus III: 2 tetradr. (Laodiceia ad mare 1, Nisibis 1) Antiochus III: 7 tetradr. (Antiocheia 4, Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Ecbatana 1, unc. mint 1) Abyath'a, Arabia Felix: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Ankara Cox, ANSMN 12 (1966), pp. 33-51, illus.
